summary.para: Numeric value representing the time-out in milliseconds.
Provide an interface to handle large Email Messages and attachments

remarks.para: This class is used Exclusively by the CEMail Class to read and write attachments.
The class reads/writes attachments in a disk folder.
If you want to store attachments on another location (for example a SQL Database) then you should subclass this class and override the implementation of the methods.
CStorage also gives you an interface to store the raw data of received emails. During reception of an email the following three methods are called:
You can use these methods to implement your own mechanism to save the raw email contents.

summary.para: Construct a CStorage object.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.AttachmentAdd(System.String,System.UInt32)

summary.para: This method is called when an email is received to initialize the saving of a new attachment.

member.returns: <cID> STRING The unique ID. If AttachmentAdd() fails it returns a NULL_STRING.

summary.para: This method is called after receiving of an attachment or after reading of an attachment from the storage during sending.

remarks.para: The implementation in CStorage closes an open file.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.AttachmentDelete(System.String)

summary.para: This method returns the full path of an attachment file addressed through cAttachID.

member.returns: LOGIC TRUE when the attachment could be deleted.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.AttachmentFullPath(System.String)

summary.para: This method returns the full path of an attachment file addressed through cAttachID.

member.returns: <cID> STRING The full path of an attachment file

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.AttachmentOpen(System.String,System.UInt32)

summary.para: This method is called during sending of an email, if an attachment have to be sent.

member.returns: LOGIC TRUE when the attachment could be opened successfully.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.AttachmentRead

summary.para: This method is called during sending of an attachment.

member.remarks: It reads a data block from the attachment file. In our implementation it reads 1536 bytes. The result string is the encoded value of this data block.
member.returns: STRING The encoded value of this data block.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.AttachmentSave(System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Stores the attachment with the ID cAttachID to the file cToFile.

member.returns: <cID> STRING The unique ID. If AttachmentAdd() fails it returns a NULL_STRING.

member.name: P:VO.CStorage.AttachmentSize

summary.para: Returns the file size of a currently stored or an opened attachment file. This access is called during receiving an email.

member.returns: DWORD The size of the attachment

summary.para: This method is called multiple times per attachment during the receive process.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.LoadEMail(System.String)

summary.para: This method returns a CEMail object filled with all data addressed through the cID.

member.remarks: You have to implement this method and the meaning of cID. THIS METHOD IS NOT IMPLEMENTED IN CSTORAGE AND NOT CALLED BY THE INTERNET CLASSES remarks>

summary.para: You can use this assign to suppress the storing of the attachments into the storage. This makes sense, if you want to store only raw email files.
This method is called when an email was received completely.
This method is called at the beginning before any data is received.

remarks.para: You have to implement how you want to store and address the raw data here.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.RawWrite(System.String)

summary.para: Now this method is called multiple times until the complete email including all attachments is received. You have to implement how you want to store each data block.

member.returns: <cID> STRING The unique ID. If AttachmentAdd() fails it returns a NULL_STRING.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.SaveAttachments(VO.CEmail,System.Boolean)

summary.para: This method stores all attachments of an email into the storage.

member.returns: <cID> STRING The unique ID. If AttachmentAdd() fails it returns a NULL_STRING.

member.name: M:VO.CStorage.SaveEMail(System.String,VO.CEmail)

summary.para: This method stores a CEMail object including all data under the address of the cID.

remarks.para: You have to implement this method and the meaning of cID.
remarks.b: THIS METHOD IS NOT IMPLEMENTED IN CSTORAGE AND NOT CALLED BY THE INTERNET CLASSES

member.returns: LOGIC TRUE when the email was saved succesfully

summary.para: Construct a StdSocket object.
